solution_line_template: The supplies for every student will cost {bow_cost} + {vinegar_cost} + {baking_soda_cost} = $<<{bow_cost}+{vinegar_cost}+{baking_soda_cost}={per_student_cost}>>{per_student_cost}.
The supplies for the whole class will cost {per_student_cost} * {num_students} = $<<{per_student_cost}*{num_students}={total_cost}>>{total_cost} in total.
